BackBWUnderhandChinup.name: Chin-up
BackBWUnderhandChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
BackBWUnderhandChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWUnderhandChinup.comments: Easier To decrease difficulty, use assisted version of exercise. SelfassistedMachine AssistedPartner AssistedBandassisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted Chinup.
BackBWUnderhandChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackBWCloseGripChinup.name: Parallel Close Grip Pull-up
BackBWCloseGripChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp parallel bars.
BackBWCloseGripChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWCloseGripChinup.comments: Easier To decrease difficulty, use assisted version of this exercise. Machine AssistedBandassisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted
BackBWCloseGripChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackBWPullup.name: Pull-up
BackBWPullup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
BackBWPullup.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWPullup.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Easier To decrease difficulty, use assisted version of this exercise. PartnerassistedSelfassistedMachine AssistedBandassisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted Pullup
BackBWPullup.synergists: infraspinatus, rhomboids, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, teresminor

BackBWPullupN.name: Pull-up (neutral grip)
BackBWPullupN.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip.
BackBWPullupN.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWPullupN.comments: Special angled pullup bar assembly is shown. Easier To decrease difficulty, use assisted version of this exercise. Bandassisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted Pullup
BackBWPullupN.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackBWPullupOpen.name: Pull-up (open-centered bar)
BackBWPullupOpen.preparation: Reach up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
BackBWPullupOpen.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWPullupOpen.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Easier To decrease difficulty, use assisted version of this exercise. Machine Assisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted Pullup
BackBWPullupOpen.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackBWRearPullup.name: Rear Pull-up
BackBWRearPullup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
BackBWRearPullup.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackBWRearPullup.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Easier To decrease difficulty use assisted version of this exercise. SelfassistedPartnerassistedBandassisted Harder Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles to increase intensity. Weighted Rear Pullup
BackBWRearPullup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids
